About Me

Hello I am Naim, since 2009 I have been in IT industry and slowly I have developed my way to a level where people know me as Full Stack developer (Part Time Job) and Network Administrator (Full Time Job) which shows how much I have been busy. I have also studied some technic in Hacking which helped me secure my System and Office. I would love to share my ideas with you guys and work for a good company under good supervision.
